sentence.Network_en: She summoned up all her pity for him, to smother her self-pity.
sentence.Network_cn: 她抑制着心中的自怜，将满腔的怜悯之情都倾注在了他的身上。

sentence.Network_en: Kozelek expresses his sense of desolation absolutely without self-pity.
sentence.Network_cn: 科泽莱克不带一丝顾影自怜地表达了自己的凄凉悲怆之感。

sentence.Network_en: His tired mind continued to wallow in self-pity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他疲惫的心继续沉溺于自哀自怜之中。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S2) ... self-perpetuating 能使自身永久存在的 self-pity 自怜 self-poise 镇定.
我爱辛普森~ ... clean up 收拾干净 self-pity 自怨自艾 much delighted. 相当不错.

list.abs: 口诀五十六︰莫自怨自怜（Don't wallow in self-pity.）3. 这句口诀的标题为「莫自怨自怜」，你有过这一种感受吗？
it ' s not self - pity or a wallowing in ' s tears ., 这不是自我可怜 , 也不是要在泪海中沉溺不起.

entry.tran: (尤指不必要或过度夸张的)自怜，自哀
entry.def: Self-pity is a feeling of unhappiness that you have about yourself and your problems, especially when this is unnecessary or greatly exaggerated.

example.ex: I was unable to shake off my self-pity...
example.tran: 我无法摆脱自怜自哀的情绪。

example.ex: Throughout, he showed no trace of self-pity.
example.tran: 他从始至终都没有表现出一丝的自怜。

means.word_mean: 1. a feeling of sorrow (often self-indulgent) over your own sufferings

sentences.en: He felt a sudden wave of self-pity.
sentences.cn: 他突然生出一阵自怜之情。
